coreAttributes.name: arm wrap
coreAttributes.description: A long strip of thick cotton, wrapped around the hands and forearms as an added layer of protection.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the strip of thick cotton around [npc.her] [npc.arms].
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wrap)] the strip of thick cotton around [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms].
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(wrap)] the strip of thick cotton around [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms].

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unwrap)] the strip of thick cotton from around [npc.her] [npc.arms].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(unwrap)] the strip of thick cotton from around [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms].
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unwrap)] the strip of thick cotton from around [npc2.namePos] [npc2.arms].
